#!/usr/bin/env python3
import requests
import os

def list_repos(username, token=None):
    """List all repositories for a GitHub user."""
    url = f"https://api.github.com/users/{username}/repos"
    
    headers = {}
    if token:
        headers['Authorization'] = f"token {token}"
    
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        repos = response.json()
        print(f"Repositories for {username}:\n")
        
        for repo in repos:
            print(f"  â€¢ {repo['name']}")
            print(f"    Stars: {repo['stargazers_count']}")
            print(f"    URL: {repo['html_url']}")
            print()
        
        return repos
    else:
        print(f"Error: {response.status_code}")
        print(response.json())
        return None

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import sys
    
    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("Usage: python3 github_list_repos.py <username>")
        sys.exit(1)
    
    username = sys.argv[1]
    token = os.environ.get('GITHUB_TOKEN')  # Optional

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import requests
import os
import sys

def create_issue(owner, repo, title, body, token):
    """Create a new GitHub issue."""
    url = f"https://api.github.com/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues"
    
    headers = {
        'Authorization': f"token {token}",
        'Accept': 'application/vnd.github.v3+json'
    }
    
    data = {
        'title': title,
        'body': body
    }
    
    print(f"Creating issue in {owner}/{repo}...\n")
    
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=data)
    
    if response.status_code == 201:
        issue = response.json()
        print("âœ“ Issue created successfully!")
        print(f"\nIssue #{issue['number']}: {issue['title']}")
        print(f"URL: {issue['html_url']}")
        return issue
    else:
        print(f"âœ— Error: {response.status_code}")
        print(response.json())
        return None

if __name__ == "__main__":
    if len(sys.argv) < 4:
        print("Usage: python3 github_create_issue.py <owner> <repo> <title>")
        print("Set GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable first!")
        sys.exit(1)
    
    owner = sys.argv[1]
    repo = sys.argv[2]
    title = sys.argv[3]
    body = "This issue was created automatically via GitHub API."
    
    token = os.environ.get('GITHUB_TOKEN')
    if not token:
        print("Error: GITHUB_TOKEN not set")
        sys.exit(1)
    
    create_issue(owner, repo, title, body, token)

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import requests

def fetch_all_pages(base_url, headers=None, per_page=100):
    """Fetch all pages from a paginated API."""
    all_items = []
    page = 1
    
    while True:
        url = f"{base_url}?per_page={per_page}&page={page}"
        print(f"Fetching page {page}...")
        
        response = requests.get(url, headers=headers or {})
        
        if response.status_code != 200:
            print(f"Error: {response.status_code}")
            break
        
        items = response.json()
        
        if not items:
            break
        
        all_items.extend(items)
        page += 1
        
        # Check if there are more pages
        if 'Link' in response.headers:
            links = response.headers['Link']
            if 'rel="next"' not in links:
                break
        else:
            break
    
    print(f"\nFetched {len(all_items)} total items across {page-1} pages")
    return all_items

if __name__ == "__main__":
    # Example: Fetch all repos for a user (paginated)
    url = "https://api.github.com/users/microsoft/repos"
    repos = fetch_all_pages(url)
    
    print(f"\nFound {len(repos)} repositories")

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import csv
from github_api import GitHubAPI
import time

def bulk_create_issues(csv_file, owner, repo):
    """Create multiple issues from a CSV file."""
    gh = GitHubAPI()
    
    with open(csv_file, 'r') as f:
        reader = csv.DictReader(f)
        issues = list(reader)
    
    print(f"Creating {len(issues)} issues in {owner}/{repo}...\n")
    
    created = []
    
    for i, issue_data in enumerate(issues, 1):
        title = issue_data['title']
        body = issue_data.get('body', '')
        labels = issue_data.get('labels', '').split(',') if issue_data.get('labels') else None
        
        print(f"[{i}/{len(issues)}] Creating: {title}")
        
        try:
            issue = gh.create_issue(owner, repo, title, body, labels)
            created.append(issue)
            print(f"  âœ“ Created #{issue['number']}")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"  âœ— Error: {e}")
        
        # Rate limiting: wait between requests
        time.sleep(1)
    
    print(f"\nâœ“ Created {len(created)}/{len(issues)} issues")
    return created

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import sys
    
    if len(sys.argv) < 4:
        print("Usage: python3 bulk_create_issues.py <csv_file> <owner> <repo>")
        print("\nCSV format: title,body,labels")
        sys.exit(1)
    
    bulk_create_issues(sys.argv[1], sys.argv[2], sys.argv[3])
